name: Dobble Trouble
description:
Controls

Use WASD to move 

Aim with the mouse

Shoot with LMB

Description: 

Help Dobble get through waves of enemies and survive the wrath of the RPG cats. A Shoot 'Em Up Horde Survival game starring Dobble the Dice Cat.

This was our first ever Game Jam creation, made during the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Disclaimer: The game is not entirely finished. It will be updated in the future

Credits

Art by Diaan

Music by Furgel Roger/Vmar (check out his soundcloud)

Coding by Wartartar

and Even More Coding by Mestzag

Special thanks to my cat Wortel, for lying still enough so I could take a picture of his paw for in the game.
